A

add(Transaction) - Method in class jchain.net.TxnMemoryPool
Adds the transaction tx to the transaction pool onliy if the tx is valid, and the pool is not full.

B

BC - Class in jchain.bc
Implements a means to create an (currently) in-memory blockchain.
BC(Block) - Constructor for class jchain.bc.BC
Returns an instance of a BC object with an initial block.
BCUtil - Class in jchain.util
Contains both static and non-static (singleton) helper methods that provide useful functionality for the blockchain.
bits(Collection<Transaction>) - Static method in class jchain.util.BCUtil
Gets the number of bits comprising all transactions in a collection.
Block - Class in jchain.bc
Implements a Block in a blockchain system.
Block(Collection<Transaction>, Header) - Constructor for class jchain.bc.Block
Returns an instance of a Block object containing the indicated transactions and linked to a previous block using the given previous block hash.
Null transactions in the collection are NOT added to the block, they are instead skipped over and a warning is printed to standard out.
BLOCK_SIZE - Static variable in class jchain.bc.Block
 
BLOCK_TIME - Static variable in class jchain.bc.Block

Returns the number of bytes in the output.

Determines the transaction size in bytes.
bytesToHex(byte[]) - Method in class jchain.util.BCUtil
Converts a byte array to a hexstring.

C

computeHash() - Method in class jchain.bc.Block
Computes a SHA-256 double hash for the block and returns it.
The hash consists of the following components: The magic number constant. The transaction count. The MerkleTree root hash. The block version number. The timestamp when the block was created. The number of bits comprising all of the transactions. The nonce. The previous block hash.
computeHash() - Method in class jchain.bc.Header
Computes the block header hash.
computeHash() - Method in class jchain.bc.Output
Overriden method provided by the Hashable interface.
computeHash() - Method in class jchain.bc.Transaction
Computes a SHA-256 double hash for the transaction and returns it as a hexstring.
A transaction hash is calculated as:
The version number of the transaction. The number of inputs in the transaction. The inputs in the transaction. The number of outputs in the transaction. The outputs in the transaction.
computeHash() - Method in interface jchain.util.Hashable
 
computeHash() - Method in class jchain.util.MerkleTree
Computes the root hash of the MerkleTree.
contains(String) - Method in class jchain.bc.Block
Determines if the block contains the indicated transaction.
contains(Transaction) - Method in class jchain.net.TxnMemoryPool
Determines if the transaction pool contains a specified transaction or not.
contains(String) - Method in class jchain.util.MerkleTree
Determines whether the tree contains a hashable with the specified transaction hash.
count() - Method in class jchain.net.TxnMemoryPool
Return the number of transactions in the pool.
count() - Method in class jchain.util.MerkleTree
Gets the number of items stored in the tree.

NoSuchBlockException - Exception in jchain.util
Thrown when retrievals either by height or by hash are made for blocks and the block does not exist or there was some other error retreiveing the block.
